queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:yd_orders` ( `shipment_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `yandex_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `yandex_full_num` varchar(16) NOT NULL default '', `status` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`shipment_id`), INDEX (yandex_id), INDEX (yandex_full_num) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:yd_order_statuses` ( `yandex_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `order_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `status` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`yandex_id`, `timestamp`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:yd_status_descriptions` ( `yd_status_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `yd_status_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `yd_status_info` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`yd_status_id`, `lang_code`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
